content: this legal text summarizes a judgment from the larino court regarding the division of a deceased persons estate the court rejected certain requests and objections declaring the deceased persons succession open it also dissolved the community property between the parties involved and awarded ownership of specific properties to each party the court ordered the transcription of the judgment and placed the expenses of the estate on the six participants dividing the costs equally the total expenses amount to €2321000 plus vat the judgment was made on january 18 2019 in larino
